page.title: 05Moy Ghost Story
page.content: One hot clammy night in the middle of August the lady was awakened by one of her children crying. She tumbled out of bed and headed down the split staircase to the childs room. Having quietened him, she was wearily plodding back upstairs when she found her way blocked by a figure. More surprised than alarmed, she looked closer at the apparition. It was that of a tall man, formally dressed and with a round, genial looking face. Before she could take further action, the figure bowed politely and moved gracefully to one side of the stairway, smiling kindly. The lady stepped past, nodding in return and walked to her bedroom door. It was only when she was safely inside that her hair began to prickle and she rushed to her bed, shaking with fright!
